item.description: Join us for dinner and drinks.  Four Square is a fairly new restaurant (formerly known as Helen's, which I must say, was quite the neighborhood dive!)  New owners, newly renovated with a very good beer selection.  After dinner, they have entertainment we can check out, or head down the street to another local watering hole w/entertainment.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Dinner/South Shore @ Four Square Rest. & Bar (Braintree) (Adults)
